description: a mwana pwo mask with pierced coffee bean eyes and a full-lipped open mouth; a cruciform scarification on the forehead; the elaborate headgear is of looped and knotted string ecrusted with clay; addenda include metal earrings, fur tassels and snakeskin bandeau; rich red color
medium: wood, clay, string, metal, fur, snakeskin, vegetable fibre cloth, tukula powder
title: Mwana Pwo Mask
